document_data.name: Hooded lantern
document_data.mainbody: A '''hooded lantern''' was the basic type of lantern; an illumination device that protected the source of light behind glass within a frame of metal.
document_data.Description:
Typical hooded lanterns consisted of a metallic frame enclosing glass panels, within which a [[wick]] connected to a reservoir of [[oil]] burned and shed light out to a range of {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}}, as long as the supply of fuel lasted, typically 6 hours for {{SI|1|pint|ml|long=yes}} of oil.

Some hooded lanterns allowed the hood to be lowered, significantly decreasing the amount of light shed by the lantern without the need to extinguish the flame.
document_data.Availability:
* In [[Athkatla]], one could find hooded lanterns for sale in the market [[Waukeen's Promenade]].<ref><ref group="note" name="Duty">''[[For Duty & Deity]]'' states that every nonmagical item featured in the ''[[Arms and Equipment Guide]]'' can be purchased at Waukeen's Promenade.
* Reinforced hooded lanterns were available for purchase through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']].
